BUY $DLM
EASILY AND SECURELY

STEP 1: CREATE A METAMASK

Metamask is a browser extension and a wallet for the decentralized web. It allows users to receive, send and store cryptocurrencies such as $DLM. To install Metamask on your Metamask website (https://metamask.io) and click on "Get Chrome Extension" or "Get Firefox Add-On" depending on your browser. For the mobile version, visit either the Google Play Store or the Apple App Store and download the app.

Once Metamask is installed, click on the “Extensions” icon in your browser, choose Metamask and click on the "Create a Wallet" button. You'll then be prompted to create a password, which will be used to access your wallet regularly.

Metamask will then generate a seed phrase (your private key) that you should absolutely write down and store in a safe place. This seed phrase is the only way to recover your wallet if you lose access to it or if you want to set it up on another device. Do not, under any circumstances, share this private key with anyone.

And voilà! You now have a Metamask wallet you can use on a large number of decentralized applications and soon on the DealM platform.

STEP 2: ADD FUNDS TO YOUR WALLET

From an exchange: After creating an account on a popular centralized exchange like Binance, Kraken or Coinbase, you can easily buy cryptocurrencies such as ETH, USDC or USDT with your credit card or with a wire transfer from your bank account. You can then transfer your crypto on your Metamask wallet and exchange it for $DLM tokens later on. For example, to withdraw crypto from Binance to your Metamask, you need to go in your wallet’s overview and click on the withdraw button, next to the “Deposit” one, just like in the screenshot below:

Once you clicked on “Withdraw” , you will need to enter the amount of ETH, USDT or USDC you want to transfer to your Metamask. To do so, copy your public address from your Metamask account and paste it in the “Address” input below while choosing the Ethereum mainnet network.

Withdrawing funds follows a similar pattern from an exchange to another, here are some extensive guides that you can follow for other exchanges if needed:
Kraken: How to withdraw cryptocurrencies from your Kraken account?
Coinbase: How to Send Crypto from Coinbase to Metamask?

If you have any issue on this particular step, feel free to contact us from the form at the bottom of this page and we will gladly help you.

From your Metamask: Metamask also allows its users to buy cryptocurrencies with credit and debit cards directly from their interface through services like Transak, Moonpay as well as wire transfers. To do so, click on the “Buy” button at the center of the screen and choose the option that’s most suited to your needs.

STEP 3: BUY $DLM TOKENS

Our token is not listed on an exchange yet and is therefore only purchasable through OTC transactions. You will need to send your funds to us and we will send back the corresponding amount of $DLM tokens to your Metamask. We currently offer two ways of establishing some fund transfers between our two parties:

By sending funds to our multi-signature wallet : In order to receive our token upon listing, you will need to send some funds to our multi-signature wallet at the following address: 0x223C87e56d37f5266C9b2bb14152077710a09687. To do so, click on the “Send” button at the center of your wallet view and paste our contract address in the designated empty field, just as shown below:

For example, at the price of $0,045 per $DLM token, if you send 1 ETH ($1645 as of 17/02/2023) to our multi-sig wallet address, you will receive 36,555.55 DLM tokens upon Token Generation Event.

By contacting us through our facebook profile : We accept OTC deals involving Fiat money through wire transfers. Don’t hesitate to reach out to us via the contact form at the bottom of this page to discuss that option.

STEP 4: VESTING SCHEDULE AND TOKEN OBTENTION

We implemented an adventageous vesting schedule for our public-sale buyers : 50% of your $DLM tokens are sent to you upon TGE and the 50% remaining will be gradually unlocked in a linear fashion over a 2 months period. You won’t have to do anything from that point except waiting for the vesting period to end to obtain 100% of your $DLM tokens.

For example, if you sent 1 ETH to our multisig wallet or bank-wired us ~$1645 as of 17/02/2023, you will receive 18,277.77 tokens the day we release our token and around ~304 tokens per day for the next 2 months.
